title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Business Strategy: Emotional Intelligence Development - Game-Based Role-Playing for Real-World Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and workplace interpersonal experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Analyze peers' non-verbal cues using three or more emotion identification strategies.
Apply self-emotion regulation techniques in two or more conflict scenarios through role-playing games.
Learners develop empathetic communication strategies that consider cultural differences through team-based projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
